TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void PropertyTranslator(object host, string propertyName, object value);
.class public auto ansi sealed PropertyTranslator extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub PropertyTranslator(host As Object, propertyName As String, value As Object)
public delegate void PropertyTranslator(System::Object ^ host, System::String ^ propertyName, System::Object ^ value);

param.name: host
param.span: 其屬性正受到對應的主控制項。

span.span: The host control whose property is being mapped.
The host control is either a or an .

param.name: propertyName
param.span: 正在轉譯之屬性的名稱。

span.span: The name of the property being translated.
The new value of the property.

summary.span: 為主控制項的對應屬性提供轉譯函式。

span.span: Provides a translation function for a mapped property of the host control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 委派由類別來實作屬性之間的對應[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。The delegate is used by the class to implement property mapping between [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Form 和 WPF 屬性對應](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md)。For more information, see [Windows Forms and WPF Property Mapping](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/windows-forms-and-wpf-property-mapping.md).
